version_description: - Minor bug fixes
- Minor bug fixes

1.2.0 Update

Industrial age and Global age have been updated!

▼ Industrial Age
We invite you to 18th century England. It's full of romance and excitement.

▼ Global Age
Experience the progress of 20th century America.

▼New feature for Sharing
You can share your civilizations with your friends on Instagram!
Show off your great civilizations to your friends.

▼ Other bug fixes
Bugs are fixed.

[Age of 2048] will continue its journey to undiscovered ages. Stay tuned for next update!

1.2.0 Update

Industrial age and Global age have been updated!

▼ Industrial Age
We invite you to 18th century England. It's full of romance and excitement.

▼ Global Age
Experience the progress of 20th century America.

▼New feature for Sharing
You can share your civilizations with your friends on Instagram!
Show off your great civilizations to your friends.

▼ Other bug fixes
Bugs are fixed.

[Age of 2048] will continue its journey to undiscovered ages. Stay tuned for next update!
Minor Bug Fix
Minor Bug Fix
Crash Bug Fix
Crash Bug Fix

1.3.0 Update
Update for Space Age!

▼Space Age
Space Age is ready!
Now, build new civilizations in unlimited space era!
Space Age support 5x5 board.

▼Improved UI
UI design and tile design are improved.

▼Bugs fixed
Minor bugs are fixed.

1.3.0 Update
Update for Space Age!

▼Space Age
Space Age is ready!
Now, build new civilizations in unlimited space era!
Space Age support 5x5 board.

▼Improved UI
UI design and tile design are improved.

▼Bugs fixed
Minor bugs are fixed.

1.4.0 Update

Winter Season Update is finally here!!

▼Perfect for iPhone X
Now you can enjoy Age of 2048 on your iPhone X.

▼Snow in all Ages.
Winter has arrived in all ages and the snow is falling in every civilization.
Join Age of 2048 in this coming winter.
Listen to Christmas carols.

▼Meet Santa Claus.
Merry Christmas!
Santa Claus will be appearing in the game during December.
All the gifts from Santa Claus are free!

▼Try to use Align Blocks.
Perfect when there are no more blocks to move.
You can arrange all the blocks in ascending order only once.
Build greater civilizations than before by using Align Blocks.

▼Other bug fixes
minor bug fixes.

1.5.0 Update Coming Soon! - New Age is Coming!

minor bug fixes.

1.5.0 Update Coming Soon! - New Age is Coming!

▼The advent of a new era!
- After a long wait, a new age of "Age of 2048" is here.
- Now discover the mysterious Ancient Egypt surrounded by secrets.
- If you complete Ancient Egypt missions, you can play.

▼ "Remove Ads" Coverage expansion! (Update is required)
- By request of many people, "Remove Ads" will be included removal of video ads as well! (When users who previously purchased "Remove Ads" update, the video ads will be automatically removed.)
- You can purchase at $ 1.99, which is 50% off until 13th May. (Including video ads removal and the price of "Remove Ads" increased to $ 3.99.)

▼Bugs fixed
Minor bugs are fixed.
